metadata.title: CVE-2020-16007 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in installer in Google Chrome prior to86.0.4240.183 allowed a local attacker to potentially elevate privilege viaa crafted filesystem.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
